name: A Right Adjoint that is not an Equivalence
definition: The forgetful functor $U: \mathbf{Grp} \to \mathbf{Set}$ from groups to sets has a left adjoint (the free group functor), making it a right adjoint. However, $U$ is neither full, nor faithful, nor essentially surjective, so it is not an equivalence.
comments: Most forgetful functors are adjoints but not equivalences.
